quote: What @steipete has built with @clawdbot is out of this world.
author: KrauseFx

quote: Rebuilt my entire site via Telegram while watching Netflix in bed. Notion â†’ Astro, 18 posts migrated, DNS moved to Cloudflare. Never opened my laptop.
author: davekiss

quote: Less than 24 hours in: cleaned up Linear issues, wrote email follow-ups, opened 3 PRs, prospected new signups.
author: avi_press

quote: Cleared 10,000+ emails from my inbox (45% reduction!)
author: jdrhyne

quote: Using @clawdbot for a week and it genuinely feels like early AGI. The gap between 'what I can imagine' and 'what actually works' has never been smaller.
author: tobi_bsf

quote: Completely hooked. Integrated emails, home assistant, homelab via SSH, todo list, Apple Notes, shopping list. All via a single Telegram chat.
author: acevail_

quote: Finds my next flight in email, runs through check-in, finds me a window seat. While I'm driving.
author: armanddp

quote: Named him Jarvis. Daily briefings, calendar checks, reminds me when to leave for pickleball based on traffic.
author: BraydonCoyer

quote: Daily calendar briefs, creates tasks in Basecamp via voice, preps me for meetings. Feels like a proactive co-pilot.
author: benemredoganer

quote: Autonomous Claude Code loops from my phone. 'fix tests' via Telegram. Runs the loop, sends progress every 5 iterations.
author: php100

quote: Within an hour, had it monitoring my full release workflowâ€”gh actions, npm publishâ€”alerting me when done!
author: shuv1337

quote: Processed our entire source of truth via WhatsApp in minutes, where RAG agents struggled for days.
author: pocarles

quote: Now my home's PM. Wife and I drop topics anytime, Clawd researches, Sunday 9am sends the roundup.
author: tonylongname

quote: A real glimpse into the personal AI-assistant future. Monitors my email, calendars, todos, and finances.
author: jverdi

quote: 24 hours later, the idea turned into a project pulling 4 million posts across 100 top X accounts.
author: andrewjiang

quote: A megacorp like Anthropic or OpenAI could not build this. Literally impossible with how corpo works.
author: Dimillian

quote: Big talk I know, but @clawdbot is the best agentic system I've used since Claude Code itself.
author: hey_zilla

quote: Clawdbot > anything GPT will ever release. Most fun I've had building in my entire life.
author: Giebz

quote: Everything Siri was supposed to be. And it goes so much further.
author: crossiBuilds

quote: Incredibly well-made, doesn't feel like slop, elegant docs, serves us better than Poke.
author: atzydev

quote: Knew my voice, my weird abbreviations, my 2am panic debugging sessions. Made me feel like a real developer.
author: xMikeMickelson

quote: Feels like the best buddy you always wanted. For me this is 'alpha AGI'.
author: OliNorwell

quote: Most fun experience in days. Haven't slept much but oh boy is my life getting automated.
author: thekitze

quote: Pure magic. My mind is blown and can't stop playing with this.
author: Abhay08

quote: World is not ready for @clawdbot
author: onusoz

quote: Feeling like Iron Man
author: MahmoudAshraf93

quote: Most interesting real world application for LLMs right now
author: chrisdietr

quote: More excited about Clawd than anything in AI since AutoGPT in 2023

quote: Totally not buying a Mac Studio as a @clawdbot home. Definitely not.
author: Dimillian

quote: @clawdbot has done my taxes. @steipete really cooked here.
author: sharoni_k

quote: Fell for hype and installed it yesterday. Feels like I've grown back part of me I forgot I had.
author: orange_boy

quote: Remember when Siri was supposed to be the future? That future exists now - it's just not from Apple or Google. Self-hosted AI that actually remembers things, messages proactively, runs 24/7 on a $5/month server.
author: velvet_shark

quote: Honestly the most 'fun' Discord server I've been on. @clawdbot is just amazing.
author: decocereus

quote: Drop it all and try @clawdbot today.

quote: It's been super fun and the personality out of the agents is amazing. The discord server has more info too and a great community.
author: aus_bytes

quote: Started testing out @clawdbot.. it's sooo cool, already setup jira-cli and added a skill for it to help us manage jira issues. I have a lot of ideas for what we can use it for ðŸ¤©

quote: It's so fun using clawbot!! You truly created something cool, I'm using it with local model, gpt-oss-120b and it's working pretty well so far.

quote: Such a cool project man, enjoy!

quote: Finally, installed @clawdbot on my MacBook and it's awesome.

quote: Now @clawdbot is going mainstream.

quote: Running the family Tesco shop as *Clawdy McClawdface's* first real test. Loving @clawdbot so far.

quote: 100%, I am honestly thinking to have a separate claude account just for clawd.

quote: Instant love - how did I not know about this???

quote: Wanted a way for it to have access to my courses/assignments at uni. Asked it to build a skill - it did and started using it on its own. Set up an integration for it to remind me before things are due.

quote: Tired: Put agents in a for loop. Wired: Tell clawdbot to use codex.

quote: @clawdbot is a cool project - lets you bring LLMs via antigravity/claude etc.. you can chat through Discord/iMessage etc!

quote: Catching fun vibes I haven't felt since I first got into computers 30 years ago.

quote: Yo clawdbot is different.

quote: Yes it can build a rocket. Yes it can connect to your synth and play songs while you sing. And it can sing along with you. Welcome to the Clawd Nation.

quote: Did you look at this Clawd bot? The thing is wild, it's good to get status from your setup/env like you have when you're out.

quote: Truly the best thing I've used in a long time.

quote: JOIN THE CLAWDBOT NATION TODAY!

quote: Too lazy to search. Asked @clawdbot to search emails for me, he goes through email, finds pdf, gives me numbers. Good bot.

quote: @clawdbot is absolute game changer for me. The amount of things I done from my phone just during my breakfast is absolutely breathtaking.

quote: The best projects are a labor of love.
